title: 148864441.an Easy And Proven Way To
excerpt: James Clear has a really great homepage.

children.text: James Clear has a really great homepage.
Just a single headline that communicates the value of the service he provides.
Paired with a super-effective email sign-up form.

If you can distill what you offer into a single-sentence line that encapsulates what it is your users can learn or do from working with you, reading your blog, or buying your product, you’ll be 80% better off than almost every other person with a homepage.
